DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
A list of types to further identify the object. Some property sets may be specifically applicable to one of these types.
> NOTE If the object has an associated _IfcTypeObject_ with a _PredefinedType_, then this attribute shall not be used.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either _PredefinedType_ is unset or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED or _PredefinedType_.
DocWhereRule.Expression:
NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR
(PredefinedType <> IfcBridgePartTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR
((PredefinedType = IfcBridgePartTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))
